name: Dark-10 Scrollbar
description: A customizable dark scrollbar to accompany the Dark-10 theme for Google Chrome or simply as a standalone scrollbar. The default settings and the buttons were made to replicate the colour scheme and shapes from the dark Windows 10 theme. FULLY WORKING ON YOUTUBE since April 26, 2019. Install style as UserCSS using Stylus or xStyle for live customization. The full theme is available on Github and the Google Chrome theme is available on the Chrome Web Store.
